info.name: MDN - Dark
info.description: by grom. Dark style for https://developer.mozilla.org/ (Mozilla Developer Network)
info.additionalInfo:
Intended for reading and casual browsing, not for logged in users of MDN.

If you want https://addons.mozilla.org/ dark as well, try style 65123.

data.title: Browser compatibility section does not have colors, rendering it useless
